meanings.definition: Protective gear worn on the knees to prevent injury.
meanings.sent1: During the game, the player wore kneepads to keep their knees safe.
meanings.sent2: She put on her kneepads before starting the construction work.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's secret weapon was a pair of magical kneepads that protected him from harm.
meanings.sent4: Her kneepads were like shields, guarding her knees from any harm.
meanings.sent5: The bright red kneepads stood out, reminding everyone of the importance of safety.
